name: Zomato
description:
The Problem

India’s restaurant industry lacked a unified digital platform. Customers struggled to discover restaurants, view updated menus, and order food easily.

The Solution

Zomato created an online food discovery and delivery platform connecting customers and restaurants through a single app.

Founder Journey

Deepinder Goyal and Pankaj Chaddah founded the company in 2008, starting with online restaurant menus before expanding into food delivery.

Revenue Model

Zomato earns through restaurant commissions, delivery fees, ads, and subscription programs like Zomato Gold.
